DataElement.preferredName: Cognitive Physical Capability Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes No indicator related to participants cognitive and physical capabilities for clinical trial eligibility

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participant Cognitive Physical Capability Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._Of or being or relating to or involving cognition._Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit._Having the ability, power or qualities to be able to do something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Property.preferredName: Cognitive Physical Capability Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Of or being or relating to or involving cognition.:Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit.:Having the ability, power or qualities to be able to do something.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Of or being or relating to or involving cognition.
Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit.
Having the ability, power or qualities to be able to do something.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable
